isis.stitle: TSI 96-12-28 - Revision to the Special Torque Value For the Oil Pan Mounting Bolts Found on the DT 408, DT 466 and International® 530 Diesel Engines

subjectgroup.subject: Revision to the Special Torque Value For the Oil Pan Mounting Bolts Found on the DT 408, DT 466 and International® 530 Diesel Engines

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION
svcproc.para: A revision to the special torque value for the oil pan mounting bolts is as follows:
Oil Pan Mounting Bolts - 18 Nm (13 lb-ft.)
Oil Pan Mounting Bolts - 23 Nm (17 lb-ft.)
This change in the torque value improves joint sealing and torque retention.

note.para: Keep a copy of this letter with the Service Manual until it is updated.
